utterances: Yeah, I guess if I were to think back on the thing that probably surprised me the most, you know, even having been up here twice on shuttle missions, is how difficult it is to keep track of everything that you have.

But you don't spend as much time here that you don't get necessarily exquisitely good about keeping track of things.

One last question: Dan Burbank, you're going to be coming back in a few days.
Is adjusting to life back on Earth going to be difficult?
